participant_1.background:
I have never told my parents that I have never liked vegetables.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
i work in a warehouse.
i like to play outside.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I'm a night owl who prefers to sleep in and do my creative work at night.
my favorite food is cheeseburgers.
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.

content.text: Hello there! I hope you're doing well today.
Hi, I'm doing well so far! How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw comics and I also love to bake.
Oh, that's cool! I like to bake too. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cookies and cakes.
Me too! I love making chocolate chip cookies.
Those are my favorite too! I also like to make carrot cake.
Ooh, I've never tried making carrot cake before.
It's really good! It's a lot healthier than other cakes too.
I'll have to try making it sometime.
You should! It's really easy to make.
Thanks for the recommendation! What are your other hobbies?
I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Oh, that's cool! I like to play video games too.
What are your favorite games?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Overwatch.
I've heard of that game, but I've never played it.
It's a lot of fun! It's a team-based shooter game.
That sounds cool! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun to play with friends.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about video games
